PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Assault + FTTC + Swash
The final column does not have any perks worth searching for in PvE, so Swash has been included for it’s potential to give the first few shots some better damage. But it’s not worth killing a roll just because it doesn’t have Swash

PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats

PvP: Hammer Forged/Polygonal/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Liquid Coils/Projection Fuse/Particle Repeater + Under Pressure/Firmly Planted/Heating Up + Kickstart/EotS/HIR
Under Pressure is essentially a better version of Heating Up which doesn’t need a kill
However you do need to choose between the two best in slot perks for fusions, Under Pressure and Firmly Planted
